caption: Marketplace - Direct List
doc: Direct list a NFT on a given NFT marketplace.

AGR.caption: NFT Contract Address
AGR.doc: The smart contract address of the NFT being listed on the marketplace.
AGR.name: nft_contract_address

AGS.caption: Token ID
AGS.doc: The token ID of the NFT being listed on the marketplace.
AGS.name: token_id

AGU.caption: Sale Duration
AGU.doc: The amount of seconds will the sale last for.
AGU.name: sale_duration

AGW.caption: Currency Contract Address
AGW.doc: The smart contract address of the token that will be exchanged for this NFT. For the native token address of the network you are working on please use 0xeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee. An example of the native token of a network is ETH on the Ethereum network or MATIC on the polygon network.
AGW.name: currency_contract_address

AGX.caption: Buy Out Price
AGX.doc: The quantity of the token that is required to purchase this NFT. Use a text input and convert the text to a number.
AGX.name: buy_out_price

AGY.caption: Marketplace Contract Address
AGY.doc: The smart contract address of the NFT marketplace the NFT is being listed on.
AGY.name: marketplace_contract_address
